20050000.text: Did you have a lot of adventures outside?

20050001.text: (there's no such thing as a great adventure)

20050002.text:
Uh huh... What are you talking about. 
Already, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> students have all been talking about.

20050003.text:
He said that he went through all kinds of troubles in the world 
and saved the world from countless crises...

20050004.text: (something seems to be exaggerated or misleading)

20050005.text:
As expected... even the humble part...
You are amazing. I respect you.

20050006.text: (trying to say something, just giving up)

20050007.text:
Our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> pupils enter at an early age
and start living in a camp.

20050008.text:
Well, I'm trying to gain various experiences,
but I can't get out of here much.

20050009.text:
Maybe you can meet the disciples and give them some advice as a senior!
Can you give me some advice?

20050010.text:
No... you're coming to a place like this.
I've heard a lot about you!

20050012.text:
Aigoo. I know. 
Aren't you the one who went through life and death with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Junju Moon</> right now?

20050013.text: (doesn't deny it strongly, but smirks in moderation)

20050014.text:
Would you mind giving us some advice,
would you like to cheer us up?

20050015.text:
(He denied that he wasn't that great,
but he said he came because he had a question)

20050016.text:
Just tell me.
If I know anything, I'll answer.

20050018.text:
Is this here? While a former expedition was moving east,
they found a giant gemstone.

20050019.text:
I investigated and found that the fertility 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>who worships <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shinsu</> There was a relationship!

20050020.text: That's why <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol Branch</> was built here to commemorate and preserve fertility.

20050021.text: (Ask that there aren't many people in the training center than you think)

20050022.text: Now is the time for practical training and cleaning up the environment according to the 4th curriculum timetable.

20050023.text:
Ah... So <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Club</> to clear up 
the real hostile forces near you

20050024.text: You can think of it as training to gain practical experience.

20050026.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> is a clan with a long history.
An excellent curriculum is the secret to attracting good talent.

20050027.text: (Ask if you can see him training)

20050028.text:
Then would you like to come with me?
I will guide you.

20050029.text:
A lot of trainees have already left.
I think we're a little late.

20050030.text:
(There are still people left
I say enough)

20050031.text:
I'm glad you said that.
You must be bored just looking at it like this

20050033.text: (I just nod my head to say I'm not very bored)

20050034.text: We don't really want to be hostile with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're Dark</>...

20050035.text: It's getting bigger and bigger and we're trying to drive it out.

20050036.text: I... may I ask you a question like this...

20050038.text:
What's your relationship with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Munju</>?
There are all kinds of speculation among the students.

20050040.text:
No. This is... something like that. It's not a big deal.
It's just that people don't know and are curious.

20050041.text: (just called alumni who learned under the same teacher)

20050042.text: Is it true? I've heard that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Munju</> has another teacher.

20050043.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> broke the existing <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> rule, But... 
Even having another teacher is very unconventional.

20050044.text: (Ask what rule you broke and became the owner)

20050045.text:
Until now, the rule was for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Previous Moonju</>'s children to take over.
So everyone <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Song Si-guk</>I thought you would become Moonju.

20050046.text: But all of a sudden, I remember that everyone was shocked when <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> became the client.

20050047.text:
Ahh, please ignore this. 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> I don't think it was meant to be talked about outside.

20050049.text: (Are you here to make a tribute to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>?)

20050052.text:
It seems that my skills have improved a lot lately.
A little bit of a striking level?

20050053.text:
Isn't there anyone in your class who can match you?
Hey, aren't you too cheeky? Haha!

20050055.text: It would be against fate for someone like me to neglect the suffering of the world, isn't it?

20050056.text: (It is said that helping people is good)

20050057.text:
In that sense, I think <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> has a problem.
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile land< <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bat</> appears in</> and people's livelihoods are shaken...

20050058.text:
I don't know what you're doing... 
I'm going to get you right now. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Wing's Catastrophe</>!

20050059.text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile land</> is supposed to be managed by <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>... .
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Leave bats</> like this <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>that you are hearing that this is a coward. ..

20050060.text: (I still recommend doing it with other people)

20050061.text:
I've already told you. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bat</> is biting and preying on people!
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> should be dealt with!

20050062.text:
But Lord Moon can't be seen, 
The Elder doesn't do that. He only says negative things that you shouldn't do it.

20050063.text: (Probably for a reason, they say you shouldn't do dangerous things)

20050064.text:
I'm not some kind of thunder-naked... 
I'm not that stupid, am I?

20050065.text: Hey, what are you talking about! Cool! Haha!

20050066.text: (Ask what the hell are you talking about)

20050067.text:
Uh-huh. Skip the trifles. Come on! I know it's hard to deal with that giant bat,
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Platinum</>!

20050068.text: But is it good enough for a normal bat <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>metallurgy</>?

20050069.text:
Neither <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Platinum</>... 
The regular <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Metallurgy</> is like this You were strong... sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo strong

20050070.text: (He said he still needs more training)

20050071.text:
I thought I'd become incredibly strong, but I still have a long way to go.
You must have already known, didn't you?

20050072.text:
(I don't know about myself,
He said he probably did)

20050073.text:
I watched it from the side... That's amazing.
I felt a huge gap.

20050074.text: I need to go back to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> and focus on training.

20050075.text:
(He said he thought well
He told me to go back with caution)

20050076.text:
Wait a minute. There are a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>metallurgy</> here,
It might be dangerous for a person like me to move alone...

20050077.text:
It's the people who live here that are provoking <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Metallurgy</> for nothing
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> I think it could be a nuisance even to...

20050079.text: Can't we just go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Wing Hunting Rendezvous</> with me?

20050080.text: Oh! Nice to see your face.

20050082.text: Now that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Platinum</>, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daemetallurgy</> is causing damage to local residents there is...

20050083.text: Seawater hunting expert, seawater treatment king <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jimmy God</> cannot be left out.

20050084.text: Well, there's something I'm going to get after I've dealt with this...

20050085.text: (Ask what you mumbled at the end)

20050086.text: No. It was about sharing the suffering of the locals.

20050087.text: Of course! Captain! He cares deeply about the residents!

20050088.text: I think you are blessed! To be able to do such an important job...

20050089.text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Platinum</> will be a bit difficult... 
Are you ready to help the people of this area?

20050090.text: Right now, only <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daemetallurgical</>. You've come at just the right time.

20050092.text:
You were right, too. 
You are welcome to own all the balls!

20050093.text: I'd rather be rewarded than that honor...

20050095.text: No no... Is it something like a reward for my heart?

20050096.text: Hey! You! You should be grateful if you get a good opportunity.

20050098.text: (Okay, I tell you to do it in moderation)

20050099.text:
I have a feeling that we will see each other again someday.
Let's say hi again then.

20050100.text:
Oh! Who is this!
Honour <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pierning Barongdan</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></> Isn't it?

20050102.text: Didn't you forget our names and think we were different from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Chief</>?

20050103.text: No doubt. If it wasn't for that, we would have called our names too!

20050104.text: (call your name and say it's nice to meet you again)

20050105.text: Heh! Get down on your knees!

20050106.text: Pup! That's right! If it wasn't for that, we wouldn't even have called our names!

20050107.text:
Come on! No matter how nice you are, this is the only way to say hello!
Honor <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong member</> has a job to do!

20050108.text: Once we go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Hill of Ghosts</> and drive out the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> Nyan!

20050109.text: I recently won a map by playing at a tavern.

20050110.text:
According to the map, there should be a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>hidden cave</> to the south of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>hill</>. 
So I came to the nearby area and set up a campsite.

20050111.text: (The map says it won't be difficult to find)

20050112.text: Of course it is. However, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> can't approach it because of it.

20050113.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Captain</> abandoned this camp and ran away first!

20050114.text: That's right! We ran all alone without even looking!

20050115.text:
Hmmmm! <myHero.name/> 
Can you help me again this time?

20050116.text: (The surrounding <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Black Dawn</> said they've already chased enough)

20050117.text:
I'm not doing this out of fear! 
It's just that <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Cave</> is hard to find!

20050119.text: Heh! It would be better to quickly correct it as us!

20050120.text:
Wow! That's right! 
You always try to get the ball alone!

20050122.text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</> had a lot of interference...
To accomplish such a great job... I'm proud of you!

20050124.text:
<myHero.name/>, 
You did well as an honorary <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The Pioneer Barongdan</>!

20050125.text: (Okay, so be careful in the future)

20050126.text: (I think I've seen it before in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile Ruins</>)

20050127.text: That's right. I went out too.

20050129.text:
Ah... I don't know all of his feelings...
I can only guess, so I'll just say that.

20050130.text:
But I'm afraid that you might hear noises around you
It's a bit awkward to talk about here.

20050131.text: Is it ok to change locations?

20050132.text:
In the past, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Song Si-guk</> did say that he was the eldest son of Mun-ju, and that everyone
 would become the next Mun-ju.

20050133.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</> rose to prominence at a young age I paid for it, but no one thought I would become a munju with it.

20050134.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> Because traditionally, unless there is a reason for disqualification, the child of the munju
would become the next munju.

20050135.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Song Si-guk</> might not be someone with extraordinary abilities
but he wasn't lacking either.

20050136.text:
Then <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Munak Song</> appointed <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> as the master ...
Isn't that when things started to go wrong...

20050137.text: (Ask why <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> became the owner of the text)

20050138.text:
I don't even know that far. Looking back now,
you must have seen through your high abilities when you were young.

20050139.text:
It is better for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> to take charge of the moonshine than your own children
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun< Maybe you made the decision thinking it was for</>?

20050142.text: I came here to do various research.

20050143.text: I recently went into <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dream Forest</> and found <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</>.

20050144.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> asks if it's anywhere in the world)

20050145.text:
Yes. Various <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> live in oceans around the world...
Not usually in forests.

20050146.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> asks why they live in the forest)

20050147.text:
Oh! You have a similar question to mine.
You're right. I was wondering why <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> live in the forest.

20050148.text:
You have to answer questions to unlock your personality...
Would you like to go with me?

20050151.text:
I'd appreciate it if you could catch some <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> over there.
Enough to experiment with.

20050152.text:
Would it be possible to use it for food?
I hope so...

20050153.text: Okay. Good. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> usually lives in water...

20050154.text: (It's not in the sea, it's not even the beach)

20050155.text:
The land in this area may have risen for some reason in the past.
Before that, this might have been the sea.

20050156.text: If you search the surrounding land carefully, you may find evidence that this place was a sea in the past, including shellfish.

20050157.text: (I wonder how <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> live out of water)

20050158.text: I'll have to study that part from now on.

20050159.text:
Assuming that the body has mutated for some reason...
Various types of mutations may have occurred.

20050160.text:
There must have been <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jellyfish</> that live in water,
and some that can live out of water.

20050161.text:
In other words, among the various mutated forms, we may only be seeing
the ones that survived here.

20050162.text:
But the truth is, I have no idea.
I hope to find the answer by researching in the future.

20050163.text:
I've come this far... 
Can you help me with other research?

20050165.text:
There was a research I wanted to do for a long time,
Is it too difficult for me to do it alone?

20050166.text: (I'm not a researcher myself, so it won't be helpful)

20050167.text:
What is high difficulty... high risk?
It's the same as high risk.

20050168.text:
A very powerful and terrifying monster lives there.
I entered the wrong place... I thought it would be my last work...

20050169.text:
The research may not have been successful, so it won't be a posthumous job.
Anyway, this is a research that I haven't tried because I fear that it will happen.

20050170.text: I can't see it for now. I'll look for the traces.

20050172.text:
Would you mind clearing up
approaching enemies while I search for traces?

20050175.text:
It can get a little dangerous from now on
You must protect me.

20050178.text: Performance? It's definitely something around here.

20050179.text:
I haven't checked the appearance yet...
I've found something amazing.

20050181.text:
I don't know the exact location... 
It's definitely around.

20050182.text:
If you look around,
I think you'll find it, but...

20050183.text:
I think it's too dangerous
I'll just do this.

20050185.text:
Well, there are people like that, but...
I want to live a long life and leave a lot of results.

20050186.text:
Unless you want to shorten your life...
I don't recommend looking for monsters anymore.

20050188.text: No. You can't help me with my research, but are you interrupting me?

20050190.text: There are also <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue people</> here. It's too dangerous.

20050191.text: (It's dangerous, so it's better to leave)

20050192.text:
Did I say I would eat here!
Did I say I would sleep here!

20050193.text: Can't get out! If I die, put it in a coffin and move it!

20050195.text:
The scholar was in danger while on patrol.
It's dangerous here, so I asked you to leave.

20050196.text: What? I'm a scholar. I'm a scholar! You dare block my research?

20050197.text:
Even though I haven't been recognized and I can't even get a research grant...
Do you know if I have no money or no pride?

20050198.text:
My father-in-law told me to change the topic because researching such things
it won't make any money...

20050199.text:
Just starve to death or quit research.
You can't stop me. You guys!

20050201.text: If it's dangerous, why don't you guys just protect me!

20050202.text: Isn't it something we can't protect every time?

20050203.text:
Then I'll just die.
Please don't disturb me!

20050205.text:
The strata here aren't on the surface,
but they're deep underground.

20050206.text: This will be proof that the earth has risen!

20050207.text: (I think everyone knows that a dragon fell and the earth rose)

20050208.text:
Did you see it? Did you see it? 
Did you see the dragon falling and the ground rising?

20050209.text:
(It sounds like you've seen it
You've never actually seen it)

20050210.text:
I don't know if the dragon fell...
I'm looking for evidence to support the hypothesis that the ground rose.

20050211.text: I found a good resource thanks to you! Thank you!

20050212.text:
And <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Crew</>! I'm exaggerating. Forgive me.
I know you're doing your job.

20050213.text:
I know it's hard to deal with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue people</>...
I'm always grateful

20050214.text: I have a favor for you. I hope you will.

20050215.text: (He said he would listen to the content and think about it)

20050216.text:
There were several <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>geologists</> here besides me.
But strangely, they all disappeared.

20050218.text:
Nothing is certain yet.
But I wondered if I was kidnapped...

20050219.text:
Of course I'm doing research here,
but I'm also looking for colleagues.

20050220.text:
The place I'm going to from now on is too dangerous for me to go alone.
You seem to be having a fight, so let's go together.

20050221.text:
I found traces of people.
These may be traces of hijackers.

20050223.text: I don't know. But where are you going to use the scholars?

20050226.text:
Then... Maybe? No... It won't happen...
Did you cut off contact with me because you didn't like me?

20050227.text: (He bows his head and doesn't say anything)

20050228.text: Ah... is this how the conversation ends?

20050229.text:
Please don't attack!
We are human.

20050231.text:
You're a geeky grandpa! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Original land</>!
How about here?

20050232.text:
Grandpa geek <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Call me Sensei</>! These guys!
Your appearance has changed, but I know who you are.

20050233.text: (The geeky grandpa asks if he admits it)

20050234.text:
Well... I have to admit that.
But I'm curious about that now?

20050235.text:
Aren't these people curious?
These are scholars who have disappeared.

20050236.text:
Our bodies changed like this during research.
I think it's an epidemic...

20050237.text:
There is not much time left to live for my grandparents.
Don't do this here and leave quickly.

20050238.text: Don't waste your time on things like research.

20050239.text: Um... let me keep what you saw here a secret.

20050240.text:
I'll investigate them and try to cure them.
I'll have to take them to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Research Paper</> somehow...

20050241.text: (It is an epidemic, but it is said to be too dangerous)

20050242.text:
Have you confirmed that it is contagious?
I am not a person who believes easily without evidence.

20050244.text:
The person in question is well aware of his or her disease?
Then there is no need to see a doctor!

20050245.text:
Anyway, I'll take care of what's next... 
You go.

20050247.text:
Don't worry about things like me and leave quickly.
There's no evidence that it's not an epidemic.

20050248.text: (If it's an epidemic, ask if there is a way)

20050249.text:
There is a way to do anything.
The problem is that there is no guarantee that it will work out.

20050250.text:
So, first of all, we need to figure out the cause.
First, as they say, it is an epidemic hypothesis

20050251.text:
Or maybe it's the '<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Germicidal</>'
that he spread the germs, a monster rumored to be from the south.

20050252.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Aggravated Virgo</> asks if it spreads germs)

20050253.text:
I don't know. 
I'm just going to list the possibilities.

20050254.text: But if that's the case, then it's strange that only geologists get caught.

20050255.text:
I rather think there's something in the stones or dirt we're investigating.
You need some help with the investigation?

20050256.text:
Can you collect the specimens here?
Examine them and you'll find out something.

20050257.text:
(If there's something on the stone or dirt,
it asks if it's dangerous to touch)

20050258.text:
Ah! That's right. That's right!
If this hypothesis is correct, it could be dangerous.

20050259.text:
Then I will collect samples.
Then I'll clean up the area in the meantime.

20050260.text:
If this is true... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geologists</> are at risk for
any scholar doing research on it.

20050261.text:
(Anyone who touches rocks or soil
it can be dangerous)

20050262.text:
That's right. Stonemasons can be dangerous too.
We haven't started farming here yet, so that's over...

20050263.text: Crews near stones are also dangerous.

20050265.text:
Yeah... we need to investigate quickly and save 
the people.

20050267.text:
I have to go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Research Journal</>.
I have something to give, and something to receive.

20050268.text: (The road is a bit long and can be dangerous)

20050269.text: I still have to go, because I promised...

20050270.text: (He said he could deliver the goods)

20050271.text:
No. It's my first job as a researcher...
You have to do it yourself.

20050272.text: When you get to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Cheers of Wave</>, follow the main road...

20050273.text: When a monster appears, I tell you to hide and then move and look left and right.

20050274.text: You have to be quiet, because the monsters might notice you if you make a noise.

20050277.text: It's ok. I wasn't nervous at all.

20050279.text:
No. There are people waiting for these instruments right now...
You have to go quickly.

20050281.text: It's ok. I also took half of the calming pill...

20050282.text: I haven't seen it yet... but based on what I've heard, we'll have to go a little further.

20050284.text: Ah. It helped me to walk step by step without giving up.

20050286.text: Thanks to you. I only studied at home until I became a scholar...

20050287.text: There are many dangerous things to do outside like this...

20050288.text: There are people who are helping out like this instead.

20050289.text: I also want to study hard and become a person who helps the world!

20050291.text:
Hello? Sohyuk!
I have a request for you.

20050292.text: I want to get some <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> weapons.

20050293.text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> ask if there are many nearby)

20050294.text:
I don't have a lot of talent for martial arts
I'm a bit...

20050295.text:
For a martial artist, the most important thing is of course
I agree, but...

20050296.text: I keep my eyes on weapons and equipment.

20050297.text:
No, if a strong martial artist has better equipment,
they'll get stronger.

20050301.text:
This is... the same weapon, but the shape is different
there are some differences in quality.

20050303.text:
Obviously, if you look closely...
There are some crude parts.

20050304.text: But let's break it down a bit.

20050305.text: Still, the creators must have had concerns in the sloppy environment

20050306.text:
I think you can get
some new ideas out of it.

20050307.text: (they say they want to get a lot)

20050310.text: If you go over there <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Valley of the Autumn Leaves</>, there are a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpions</>.

20050311.text: No matter how much I think about it, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</> is poison!

20050313.text: Are you sure? <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</>'s primary weapon is poison, isn't it?

20050314.text:
By the way. 
The little merchant next to me knows nothing.

20050315.text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</> is <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Claws</> your main weapon, whatever... 
It's nonsense. That!

20050316.text:
I can't hear you properly...
Please tell me!

20050318.text:
You can think so.
You can!

20050319.text:
By the way! The venomous <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</> is
the weak <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</>.

20050320.text: Because he's weak, he uses poison to protect himself.

20050321.text:
For <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>strong claws</> <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</>, poison is only secondary
strong. I don't need it.

20050322.text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>strong claws</> asks if <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</>
is weak venom)

20050323.text:
No need for strong poison.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</>'s prime weapon, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Claws</> is there!

20050324.text:
Why do you hold your opponent down!
Put a saliva in them! Add venom! Whoa!

20050325.text: wouldn't you be killed by a counterattack?

20050326.text:
The venomous <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</> is dangerous and people avoid it.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tongs</> The strong <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</> are coming to attack them.

20050327.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Those with strong claws</> have quick feet.
I'm really scared!

20050328.text: (Ask if this will end the argument)

20050330.text: Ah! But... how do you compare this?

20050331.text: If it is the same class, compare the strength and hardness

20050332.text: If it's the same poison, I'll see a fatality rate...

20050333.text:
(He seems to have done 
what he has to do)

20050334.text:
No, no! 
I didn't mean to ask for more.

20050335.text:
Now that it's like this,
I think we had a nonsensical argument.

20050336.text:
If you talk to that guy,
It's weird because you're talking.

20050339.text: Is that so? I thought it was normal...

20050340.text: (the voice is said to be loud)

20050341.text:
I am in charge of logging at <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>.
I raise my voice while working in the field...

20050342.text: Ah! By the way... there is one problem.

20050344.text:
The workers are dangerous
to the extent that they won't be able to work.

20050347.text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandalas</> are dangerous,
and they say it's definitely noisy)

20050349.text: (it was said to be quite unpleasant)

20050350.text: Is that right? I must have been too engrossed in my work.

20050351.text:
(You may have lost your hearing due to noise
Please see a doctor)

20050352.text: Ah. Is it? Come to think of it, it could be.

20050353.text: (and they say it would be nice to have noise suppression equipment for workers)

20050354.text: That's a good thing! I'll make a suggestion.

20050355.text:
(Your face looks pale
Ask if you're okay)

20050356.text: It's okay, because it's not a matter of a day or two.

20050357.text:
(The fact that this has been going on for a long time
I don't think it's a good thing)

20050359.text:
When I strangely see <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ashen Black Crawler</>...
My legs are shaking, my heart is beating...

20050360.text:
My fists are not clenched properly,
Because my steps are heavy.

20050361.text:
(Ask if you have any bad memories of 
something <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red Crab</>)

20050362.text:
No. It's not like that.
It's been like that since the first time I saw it.

20050363.text:
I thought it was a
fear of something huge monster or disgusting...

20050364.text:
Looking at other things and seeing things that aren't
I don't think that's the case...

20050365.text:
(I'll get rid of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>rock moth</>
ask if you'd like to come and see it)

20050366.text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Forest Veil</>? nI think I can go out once...

20050368.text: I'm sorry. I was meant to go...

20050369.text:
I was moving, but the thought of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Rock crow</>...
My legs were shaking and I couldn't walk.

20050371.text:
I'm sure you've killed a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>rock moth</>...
I don't know why I'm so scared.

20050372.text: I don't know if a timid person like me would fit <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>.

20050373.text: I think I should find another way now.

20050375.text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> should have a good legislator
Go and ask)

20050377.text: Would you like to hear my story?

20050378.text: (Ask what's going on again this time)

20050379.text: There are <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ashen Jungle</><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Western people</> appearing over there.

20050382.text: Is that right? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tooth</> is correct no matter how you look at it.

20050383.text:
By the way, the old merchant standing next to me, 
who doesn't know anything.

20050384.text:
When you say <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Seoin</>, you insist on <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claw</>
again. .

20050385.text:
You don't even hear me properly anymore,
Please tell me what I'm saying.

20050387.text:
I've seen mostly immature children
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>tooth</> obsessively.

20050388.text: Is that the feeling of bringing something to your mouth?

20050390.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claw</> is a symbol of a grown creature.

20050391.text:
It cannot be used properly without continuous maintenance
.

20050392.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>attacking with claws</> or biting with your mouth
Which do you think is more intelligent?

20050393.text:
(Neither of them think intelligently, but
If I had to choose, I would say <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Claw</>)

20050394.text:
Is that true? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claw</>?
I can't think of anything other than <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claw</> .

20050399.text:
If you simply compare the strength and hardness,
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tooth</> seems to be overwhelmingly strong

20050400.text:
That's why if you say <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tooth</> is your best weapon...
If an old merchant wouldn't approve, would you?

20050402.text:
(I'm not sure about that...
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Westerners</> said they used separate weapons)

20050403.text: Yes? Even with such strong <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claws</>?

20050405.text: I'm a little hungry. I ate <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> earlier, maybe that was the problem?

20050407.text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> that grows on the body of Samyojeong</>.
Accidentally < textColor=[215:94:94:255]>I found a dead body</>

20050408.text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> grown from the corpse caught my eye.

20050409.text:
Ah! That's it! This can't be delicious!
I've come to this conclusion.

20050410.text: (In the end, I ask how it tasted)

20050411.text:
The taste is a little bitter. But when you reach that level,
you can enjoy the bitter taste.

20050412.text:
(If poison<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</>... 
the corresponding <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> They say it needs to be investigated.)

20050413.text:
No, it's fine.
You'll probably get a little stomach ache.

20050414.text:
(Ask if anyone was here
Where did you go)

20050415.text: Ah. I fell down earlier and was taken to the senator.

20050417.text:
I think I ate something wrong...
Your doctor needs to know that to be able to cure...

20050422.text:
Hey! Wait there! 
If you pass by yourself like that, you're in trouble!

20050424.text:
Hey, that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon tribe</> is incredibly violent. I also lost all of my coverage!
You're lucky to have met me.

20050426.text:
Yes! I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Rookie Myunghye</> on a cross-ethnic investigation.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> The Hongdon clan</> are violent, but they can communicate... so I tried to cover it.

20050427.text: At first, he seemed to be curious about the interview, but he suddenly got angry when asked how many bowls of rice a day he eats!

20050429.text:
Anyway, I plan to wait for you to fall asleep and then secretly retrieve the data.
Wait with me too, then quietly pass by.

20050430.text: (He said he would find the material)

20050431.text:
Hey... that's a cool weapon. People don't know about it, but the 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> are a great race with gunsmithing skills as well.

20050432.text:
Most heterogeneous except <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suwa</> Now that we have lost our wisdom, 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Exchange with the Hongdon clan</> will be a must for each other!

20050433.text:
I can't just give up like this.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon on <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Forest Road</> >I want to meet you too. Would you like to go with me?

20050435.text:
There's a female human! Why do you keep coming back?
Aura <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> why don't they even light their noses?

20050436.text: Eh... me? Am I the first to come?

20050437.text:
Kooing? Humans are alike and confused. 
Humans, we have no intention of reconciling unless we keep this promise <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Foster</> !

20050439.text:
Wow! I'm very patient. I'll tell you one last time.
So open your ears and listen carefully!!!!!

20050440.text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> is the land we will settle if we help clear <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> You promised to give me money.
We did our best to help humans. But!!!!!!

20050441.text:
But <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> didn't pay us anything!
You're always making cowardly excuses.

20050442.text:
We can't stand it any longer. 
We have no choice but to take the land by force!!

20050443.text: Something like that... I didn't even know that...

20050444.text:
My stomach hurts just thinking about it. That's why I can't lose weight!!!!
Human, if you know now, go ahead and tell me.

20050445.text: Okay! I'm sure I'll tell you!

20050446.text:
Obviously the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red Donkey</> is just annoying.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> is a replacement For what reason did you use <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> and throw it away?

20050448.text:
On behalf of mankind, we must regain the lost trust!
Before that, we must also listen to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</>. I must be very busy for the time being.

20050449.text:
Thanks for your help!
Then I'll go first!

20050451.text:
...because of my son.
I don't have any friends my age, so I always play alone, and I can't help but feel sorry for him.

20050452.text:
I wonder if I just moved here...
I can't get my job done.

20050453.text: (...you seem to be having a good time alone...)

20050455.text: (He says he'll play for a while)

20050456.text: Really? I'd like to ask you a second!

20050457.text: Who are you! Maybe... you came here to be my assistant, right?

20050458.text: (He seems to be absorbed in the detective game. First he nods his head)

20050459.text:
Ahem! This body is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Kwon Doi</>!
You have to pass a test to become my assistant!

20050461.text: Where then... do you know how to do martial arts?

20050463.text: So can you catch <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Wolf</> in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Pungbaekmun Forecourt</>?

20050465.text: Okay! Then show your assistant by killing <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Wolf</>!

20050466.text:
Wow! It's the assistant!
Can the assistant even beat these bad guys?

20050468.text:
Take care of these guys! 
They stole our luggage and harassed us!

20050469.text:
Mr. Kim was seriously injured because of them!
That's why I said <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> all of them were kicked out!

20050470.text: (He will kick you out, so he tells you to calm down)

20050471.text:
I'm so excited!
It's the first time I've come this far, but I also scolded the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon people</>!

20050472.text: Let's go over that hill over there!

20050473.text: (He says it will be hard to go further)

20050476.text: Cheet...then I'll take you today to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>secret place</> I'm investigating.

20050477.text: (It's too late, Dad says he's worried)

20050478.text:
Very close! <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Just under Poongbaekmun</>Hey!
It's a very suspicious place. I found it!

20050479.text: Follow me! <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Meet at the bottom of the stairs to Poongbaekmun</>!

20050481.text:
I think... 
This is a terrifying place where deaf people are locked up until they repent!

20050482.text:
Is there a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Scary Uncle</> who comes here often? 
A ghostly man with long dark hair and a white face!

20050483.text: That <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Uncle</> is here fighting <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Elder</> every day!

20050485.text:
You said nothing? I just got mad and went back. 
'The order is mine!' while doing this.

20050486.text: (From now on, please don't come here alone)

20050488.text: (It's too late, let's go home soon)

20050489.text:
Hey, you're here. 
We're so excited that our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doi</> had a great adventure.

20050491.text:
Hey, I know that taking care of a child is hard work.
Thank you very much.

20050493.text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dungeon</>? This is the first time <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> has such a place. Listen.
I think the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonpawon</> people know better than me.

20050496.text: How did the small council get there... it's... so...

20050497.text: It's not a secret, but for us <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>, it's embarrassing to say that it's such a cheesy place.

20050498.text:
Hmm... That underground facility was not made by us. 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</>... made it.

20050499.text:
Probably <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> soon settled here,
so <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>black I'm guessing it was created around the time the dawn </> was created.

20050500.text:
...they said they expected there to be a hiding place nearby at the time, but 
no one seems to have doubted under their feet.

20050501.text:
I didn't get rid of that mistake so I wouldn't forget it,
I didn't know there were children coming and going.

20050502.text: We will discuss with the other elders to make a closure.

20050504.text:
Hey, I won't refuse. Let's see... I can't get enough of ordinary wood from the water...
Ah! Hard <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Aged maple</> Could you please save me?

20050505.text:
You are very talented.
You must have collected them all...

20050506.text:
Oops, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Prison</> has decided to close. 
What I'm doing is to create a playground for children.

20050507.text: I am going to go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumberjack</> with the workers because it looks like it will be a full-fledged construction project.

20050508.text: So... can you help me clear the way?

20050510.text:
Thanks for your help.
Thanks to you, I can safely cut down trees.

20050511.text:
...even now... on that hill there are many inspectors of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>We are fighting the Black Dawn</>.

20050512.text:
When the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</> begin to hatch in our <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Underground of Poongbaekmun</> , 
If you plucked those buds back then...

20050513.text:
If that was the case, so many people wouldn't have been hurt and suffered as much as they do now.
It's a thing of the past, but everyone at <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> has the same regrets. will have it.

20050514.text: So... other things seem to have been trivial and not looked at closely.

20050515.text:
I held on to a busy person and offered only exhaustive excuses.
Now~~Now, leave the rest to me.

20050516.text:
You can stop now! How long are you going to be like this?
The Vice-Captain has done enough!

20050518.text: Let's go back together. Please, okay?

20050519.text: (What's going on? Let's go and hear the story.)

20050522.text:
...do you know of the huge fertility mining incident that took place here in the past?
This man was <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Chief of Discipline</> at the time.

20050523.text: He was the one who insisted that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> secretly mine fertility.

20050524.text:
On a tragic day, send all your troops to this <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>dig</> for support
I am <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> It is said that they performed a sole mission to divert the gaze of Pungbaekmun</>.

20050525.text:
...that's how he survived the tragedy alone.
All his crew and allies have turned into <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>verse verse</>.

20050526.text:
But do you think this figure is alive?
If you scream in front of you or swear, you won't hear me.

20050528.text:
You're trying to find a peaceful death... for your subordinates who have become <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sciences</>.
With your own hands... End all You will carry the guilt yourself. Uh huh...

20050529.text:
Since this area is so dangerous, I take turns watching with my colleagues...
I'm worried that I won't be able to come for a while.

20050533.text:
I'm sorry... I'm sorry... 
Please don't forgive the bad commander...

20050535.text: How did you come up with all that?

20050537.text: It's been a while since I've seen you cry like that...

20050538.text: You look great, can you help a little more?

20050539.text:
This <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile Surround</> is full of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burnts</>.
 It's a dangerous place for a weary old man to go back alone.

20050541.text: Thank you. I haven't been able to keep going, but I'm glad I met Sohyup.

20050542.text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Wild Conservation Society</> asks what's going on so far)

20050543.text:
You?! Help me!
It's an urgent matter with a life at stake!

20050544.text: (Keep your excitement down and tell him)

20050545.text:
Huh... I recently came to this fertile land to track 
deer antlers that are illegally circulating in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suwol Plains</>.

20050546.text:
By the way! That's where those brutal <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burners</> are settling in!
I should go and report this...

20050547.text:
I can't stop walking when I see deer dying with their antlers cut off.
I beg you. Help me.

20050548.text:
Thanks to you, we rescued all the deer that were captured.
It's a terrible thing to be slaughtered indiscriminately because of their beautiful antlers.

20050549.text:
I'm planning to go back to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Soowol Plains</> only seeing this guy recover.
Go, announce this and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Action </> should ask for assistance.

20050550.text:
Thanks for your help. 
Let's meet again then!

20050551.text: Aww! I was surprised! I thought it was <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mutated Samyojeong</>!

20050553.text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>I have a herb that I urgently need to send to the desert</>, so I came to look for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lingling</> alone !

20050555.text:
If you go a little further towards the sunrise, there is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>a wide and hot desert</> nyang~
It's so hot over there that a lot of people get heat stroke. !

20050556.text: A little scary, but <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lingling</> should do it!

20050558.text:
Really? 
Then help me find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Coolgunggung Flower</>!

20050559.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Flower of the cool breeze</> grows where the cold wind blows and 
the smell of the dawning dawn blows!

20050561.text:
Then please protect me by my side.
Actually <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lingling</>Eunnyang... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Samyojeong</> is also scary, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Pussy </> is also very scary!

20050562.text:
Look at this~! 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Lingling</> I found it by myself!

20050564.text:
But there's still one more left... 
To make a cure for heat stroke, you'll also need to get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Watertail Grass</>!

20050566.text:
Woah! It's the best! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Watertail grass</>Eun-nyang~ 
It smells like warm salt and grows in a place where the fresh sunlight shines~!

20050567.text:
Wow! This is <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Watertail Grass</>Nyanya!
<myHero.name/><ga/> Did you find it? That's great. Nyan!

20050570.text:
As long as you only have these <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cool Gingerbread Flowers</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Watertail Grass</>~
The travelers who ate the heat in the desert will be able to recover safely~!

20050571.text:
I'll have to bring it to you soon!
Then we'll see you again~!

20050572.text:
I... are you a traveler? 
We've been robbed of money and everything, but... if there's any leftover food...

20050573.text: Ugh... The name of the honeymoon is... To beg for food today...

20050575.text:
Didn't you see <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spears</> on the way?
They gave them money, gifts, and even a suitcase! They stole it all!

20050576.text: (The newlyweds ask what's going on here.)

20050577.text: I... for no reason asked me to take a boat ride at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dragonhead Cape</>... so black

20050578.text:
These days, it is fashionable for young newlyweds to go on long-term trips to the Haewol Continent.
Although I usually only go around the safe <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Taerokrim</>.

20050579.text: (It's dangerous here, so please go back)

20050580.text:
Yeah... it was very dangerous... I desperately felt it. 
Thank you for saving my life, but I don't have any money, so there's no way I can go back...

20050581.text: (He said he would find the luggage)

20050583.text:
That big guy got a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gold bag</>, and your girlfriend with a bow <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gift</>I stole it!
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The suitcase</> was picked up by a young man and carried through that fence!!!

20050584.text: I told you to prepare a big bang, what are you doing with these little bastards?

20050585.text: Oh my gosh, that's what he said he was looking for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Luggage</>...

20050587.text: Hurry up, you guys! I'm going to go find my treasure! Cuckoo

20050588.text: Hey, you spying rat. You're lucky today.

20050589.text:
Hey, you're here! Are you not hurt anywhere?
Oh my God...! I guess that's it!!

20050590.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gold bag</>, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gift</>, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Travel bag</>...
Thank you, Daehyup! Thank you so much!

20050591.text: Huh~~ Now that I'm relieved, the beautiful scenery catches my eye.

20050592.text:
Really!~ The beautiful Mt. Geumsugang, and even the kind guest~ 
Suddenly, the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile Land</> is so good?

20050593.text:
Shall we settle here soon?
I heard that immigration support policies are good these days!

20050594.text: It's me, I'm fine wherever I am with you~

20050596.text:
Oops, Daehyup! Here's a small castle. 
Thank you so much for making our honeymoon a pleasant memory!

20050597.text:
Isn't it <myHero.name/>?
Did Lord Moon come with you?

20050599.text:
Ah... that's right. I need Munju-sama's action right now... 
How do you do this?

20050601.text:
I'm not sure how to explain it... 
Have you ever experienced cracks?

20050603.text:
You know... 
the unpleasant dark aura you can feel when you go near a rift.

20050604.text: The aura... A place filled with that aura that cannot be described in words has appeared.

20050605.text: (surprised and asks if there is such a dangerous place)

20050606.text:
Yeah. So when Master Moon came, I was going to go together... 
After this, I'll have to go alone.

20050607.text:
(You don't know what will happen
He said he would go with him)

20050608.text:
(You can see a huge gap that seems to be connected somewhere and 
You can see the Biryu River standing in front of it)

20050610.text:
(Ask if you want to 
enter the crevice of Biryuha)

20050611.text:
I originally intended to do that...
The Bulma energy is so much stronger than I expected.

20050612.text:
That's why I'm going to investigate
information around me until Lord Moon comes.

20050613.text: Are you planning to enter the small cooperative?

20050615.text:
Be careful.
You can feel the energy of a huge fire inside.

20050616.text:
Probably, there are high-level bullies that you can't see outside... 
I guess.

20050618.text:
It seems too dangerous to deal with. 
I need to prepare thoroughly.

20050620.text:
Then I'll start scouting around.
Please take care.
